original: Archer Daniels Midland Co. (ADM) is one of the largest food processing companies in the world. Founded in 1902, it has grown into a behemoth with over 31,000 employees and a presence in more than 160 countries. However, the company's reputation has taken a hit over the past few years due to a scandal involving price-fixing. On Tuesday, ADM's Chairman, Juan Luciano, issued a public apology to share
